contents.value:
A calculator function with multiple parameters
  
  
---  
  
### Parameters  
  
`float` ***x*** : First operand  
`float` ***y*** : Second operand  
`string` ***operation*** : The operation to perform  
  
---  
  
### Return  
`float` : The calculation result  
  
---  
  
[View API Docs](https://lib.ballerina.io/test/pkgB/0.1.0#calculate)
